titles.title: A resolution designating March 3, 2003, as "Read Across America Day".
A resolution designating March 3, 2003, as "Read Across America Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on February 27, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates March 3, 2003, as Read Across America Day.Honors Theodor Geisel (Dr. Seuss) for his success in encouraging children to discover the joy of reading.Encourages parents to read with their children for at least 30 minutes on Read Across America Day.
